scripts.build: pnpm build:demo && pnpm copy:types && pnpm --filter src build
scripts.copy:types: mkdir -p src/node_modules/@typed-router && cp demo/.nuxt/typed-router/* src/node_modules/@typed-router/ && echo '{"name": "@typed-router", "version": "0.0.0", "private": true}' > src/node_modules/@typed-router/package.json
